welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Meco, Spain! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful city known for its picturesque streets, delicious food, and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Meco has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Barajas Airport, dedicated to serving low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: The satellite terminal of Terminal 4, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 15 minutes.
